import {useState} from "react"; function TodoForm(){ const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [product, setProduct] = useState(''); const [lists, setList] = useState([]); const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // ðŸ‘ˆï¸ prevent page refresh setList((lists) => [...lists, { name: name, product: product }]); document.getElementById("todoForm").reset(); }; return(

setName(event.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="AdÄ±nÄ±z ve SoyadÄ±nÄ±z" />

) } export default TodoForm;
